entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, I need to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little over two weeks ago and it's just not working out for me.
I understand. Can I get your order number, please?

Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on July 12th. Today is July 27th. Unfortunately, our return window for electronics is 10 days. I am sorry, but it is outside the return window.
What?! Ten days? That's ridiculous! I just bought this thing! I need a refund. This is unacceptable. I'm a loyal customer!

I understand your frustration, sir. I do see that your purchase falls outside of our stated return window. While I can't offer a full refund, let me see if I can explore any other options for you. I'm checking our policy to see if a policy exception can be made in this case.
Well, hurry up! I don't have all day. I need to return this VeloBand Pulse.

Thank you for your patience. I've reviewed your account and while a full refund isn't possible due to the return window, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase price. This store credit can be used on any VeloFit product, including a different model of fitness tracker or even apparel. How does that sound?
Store credit? Ugh, fine. I guess that's better than nothing. But I really wanted my money back.

I understand. I'm processing the store credit now. It will be applied to your VeloFit account immediately and you'll receive an email confirmation. This will allow you to purchase a similar item or another product on the VeloFit website. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
So, the store credit will work on any VeloFit product, not just another VeloBand Pulse?
That is correct. The store credit is valid for any item available on the VeloFit website.
Okay, good. Thanks. I appreciate you at least doing that for me. Even though the return window situation is still annoying.
You're very welcome. We appreciate your business and hope you find something else you enjoy. Please let us know if you have any further questions. Have a great day!
